title: Publish Health
description: Daily USD publish success rate, duration, and output volume (gold_publish_health_daily).

panels.title: Publish Success Rate (%)
panels.description: Daily average publish success rate across all shows, sequences, and event types.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, ROUND(AVG(success_rate_pct), 2) AS "Success Rate %" FROM gold_publish_health_daily GROUP BY event_date ORDER BY event_date

panels.title: Avg Publish Duration (ms)
panels.description: Daily average wall-clock duration of successful USD publish operations.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, ROUND(AVG(avg_duration_ms), 2) AS "Avg Duration (ms)" FROM gold_publish_health_daily WHERE avg_duration_ms IS NOT NULL GROUP BY event_date ORDER BY event_date
